DOC.detailed_description: This study examine 8-year follow-up result The MOM Program , randomize control trial ( RCT ) mix professional home visit program promote positive developmental outcome among child poverty . The early study find significant difference school participation behavior among intervention group age 33 60 month age . Families original MOM Program RCT provide inform consent eligible study child 8 year age .
